name: Onslot Car
description:
Onslot Car is a racing game, and the theme is the toy town of slot car. It's easy to play, but so fun!

Run the beautiful course and Go faster than the others! Enjoy lots of themes and stages.

You can play easily by a hand only, but it's a great challenge to ranked within the top 20% of the whole world. Of course, you can play offline.
